price: And I fear my kinsmen after me,[3] and my wife is barren; so grant me from Yourself an heir,
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
